lag_calc¶

Functions to generate pick-corrections for events detected by correlation.

copyright:EQcorrscan developers.
license:GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 3 (https://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html)

Classes & Functions¶

lag_calc Main lag-calculation function for detections of specific events.

Private Functions¶

Note that these functions are not designed for public use and may change at any point.

_channel_loop Inner loop for correlating and assigning picks.
_day_loop Function to loop through multiple detections for one template.
_prepare_data Prepare data for lag_calc - reduce memory here.
_xcorr_interp Intrpolate around the maximum correlation value for sub-sample precision.
